findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the excluded list or evaluate total supply, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are a long list of excluded addresses.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to change critical contract parameters such as tax fee, liquidity fee, and maximum transaction amount.
